source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: ICEMCFD Master Class (Level 1)
items.headline: Learn Ansys ICEMCFD Hexa meshing on complex cases and get accurate results out of your CFD simulation
objectives_summary: Students will learn to create high quality hexa meshing in ICEMCFD

items.title: Lumion 10 Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: Photorealistic 3D Rendering and 3D Animation for Architect and Interior  Designer
objectives_summary: Become a Lumion10 expert
Learn all commands and know how to use them appropriately

items.title: Hard surface modeling in MODO
items.headline: Learn how to model efficiently and get perfectly clean meshes
objectives_summary: Know how to deal with typical modeling problems
Get your geometry well organised
Manage to work in all quads

items.title: Game Art Basics: Create a 3D Environment

visible_instructors.title: Rob Aduna
visible_instructors.name: Rob
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Environment Artist in the Video Games Industry

items.headline: Learn to create a professional quality environment using high end tools: Unreal Engine, Megascans and Substance Painter.
objectives_summary: Reference Gathering and Planning
Set Piece Modeling
Modular Modeling for Efficiency

items.title: Character Creation for Game | Complete Pipeline
items.headline: Learn the entire pipeline from sculpting to texturing with Zbrush, Topogun, Maya, Substance Painter & Marmoset toolbag.
objectives_summary: Making Shirt, Jacket & Pant in Marvelous Designer
Learning Different Type of Folds
Retopology

items.title: VFX Shot Creation from Scratch with Maya and After Effects

visible_instructors.title: Vicki Lau
visible_instructors.name: Vicki
visible_instructors.job_title: Multi-Hyphenate Artist, VFX Pro, TEDx Speaker, Author

items.headline: The untold story of Vicki Lau and her journey in re-creating a startling incident from scratch, using visual effects.
objectives_summary: Know what, when and how to create a visual effects shot from scratch using various software
Know how to use Autodesk Maya for 3D model creation
Know how to use Adobe Photoshop for the creation of textures

items.title: Model and Texture a Cannon with Maya and Substance Painter

visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!

items.headline: Learn to build a 3d game asset from scratch using these industry-standard software packages!
objectives_summary: Model a game asset with Maya
Sculpt details in ZBrush for a game asset
Texture the asset using Substance Painter

items.title: Blender: Create Realistic BMW 507 From Start to Finish
items.headline: Step by step we will learn how to create realistic 1957 BMW car with Blender 2.92 from start to finish.
objectives_summary: Learn how to set up the scene and add the blueprint images in the right way.
Understand how subdivision and shrink wrap modifier works.
Learn how to model the car and how to avoid shading problems when you add the subdivision modifier.

items.title: After Effects: Create Publishable Motion Graphic Templates
items.headline: The complete course you need to learn expressions, various controls & creating motion graphic templates in After Effects
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you will be ready to publish your very first template. It may be promo video, explainer video or something else
Now you don't have to afraid of expressions any more. You will get excellent understanding in writing scripts
Create stunning motion videos fast & efficiently using professional animation techniques

items.title: Rigging a Low Poly Character in Maya 2018

visible_instructors.title: Eric Kunzendorf
visible_instructors.name: Eric
visible_instructors.job_title: Associate Professor of Animation at Jacksonville University

items.headline: Create a simple character rig, bind and paint weights on a low polygon character
objectives_summary: Rig biped characters of their own

items.title: How to sculpt Creature Concept at ZBrush
items.headline: Learn how to make Creature Concept at ZBrush in a fast and easy way.
objectives_summary: Learn how to desighn Your creature.
Learn how to sculpt Your creature.
Learn how to render and make great looking concept.

items.title: Create Custom 3D Designs With Tinkercad
items.headline: Learn 3D Design with Tinkercad
objectives_summary: 3D Design

items.title: Create a Creature Head in Cinema 4D
items.headline: Model and Sculpt Creature Concept art and Finish in Photoshop.
objectives_summary: 3D concept art in Cinema 4D.

items.title: After Effects for Beginner : Learn by Creating a Lower Third
items.headline: An Interactive way of learning and creating
objectives_summary: Animation for Beginners : Learn to create lower third in Adobe After Effects

items.title: Rhino 3D : Jewelry Design In Action

visible_instructors.title: Hamed Arab
visible_instructors.name: Hamed
visible_instructors.job_title: Jewellery CAD Designer, Jeweller and Instructor

items.headline: Modeling a Three-Stone Ring in Rhino
objectives_summary: Get to know Jewellery techniques for designing  jewellery with computer and Rhino 3D
Learn advance tips and tricks in Rhino
Design CAD models within the metrics of scale, proportion and element relationships

items.title: Female Anatomy Sculpting in Zbrush
items.headline: Create hyper realistic female characters with perfect anatomy and skin details.
objectives_summary: Sculpting female Skeleton
Sculpting female Muscle
Sculpting the female Character
